name: AXECAPADE (GMTK19 JAM)
description:
Playable with Mouse and Keyboard && CONTROLLER!

Keyboard Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - To Move
  • Left Click  - To Attack/Grab
  • Right Click  - to Charge and Release throw.
Gamepad Controls
  • Left Stick - to move
  • Right Trigger - to Attack/Grab
  • Left Trigger - to Charge and Release throw.
  • Art/Design/Code By Salman Shurie (@Salman_Shh)
  • music by Teknoaxe
